entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
